issue.title: SystemSetupDockerInstall should contain the docker installation step

content.raw:
Let me clarify that you do NOT need run `docker commit` commands or do development inside the docker container.

We do encourage teams to use the Docker image to run the _**SubT Virtual Simulator**_; while you continue developing your solution in your local catkin workspace and later spinning out Docker image\(s\) of your solution to be tested with [Docker Composer](https://docs.docker.com/compose) before submitting it onto the Clousim \(as shown below\). HTH!
